page.title: 08FRUIT GROWING
page.content: A lot of this area is used to grow fruit.Mr.Bottom is a fruit grower and owns about one hundred and twenty four acres of land. All his fruit growing is done outside. His main crop is Bramley apples which are used for processing and putting in apple pies.He also grows desert apples or eating apples such as Laxtons and Coxes. Apart from apples he grows Conference pears,plums and cherries. The cherries are cooking cherries called Marella and are grown mainly for processing. He does not grow vegetables because to grow fruit he just needs one range of machinery,but to grow vegetables you need a completely new range of machinery which is expensive to buy. There are many problems growing fruit.Frost is one of the main ones.
